content: If you run into any issues after finding the <style=Highlight>visitor</style>, mo need to worry. Bring them back to the Camp, and {A抱歉}we'll figure it out together.
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: {A想到了}Oh right, something out of the ordinary happened. While you were decorating your new home, Esassani spotted a <style=Highlight>visitor</style> nearby...
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: If you ever need anything in the future, just come by the camp and talk to me. We'll do our best to help you with your life here.
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II
星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: Hoho, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, welcome! Looks like your home is all set.
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II
星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: About the gift <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> sent to your PuffPost Box... {A挠头}Did you like it?
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: Mo need to rush, take a look when you have time. Anything that goes into the PuffPost Box won't get lost, and it won't ever get full, hoho!
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II
星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: The visitor should be near the open area around the Camp. Esassani has marked the location on the map. Please use your phone to access the <style=Highlight>Map</style>...
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: Maybe they're here to visit your <style=Highlight>Protoplanet</style>. Do you want to go say hi?
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II

content: Hoho! So glad you like the clothes we picked out for you. As for more gifts... don't worry, there's always more where that came from.
info: 星球访客-莫白废弃_主流程文本II
